meanings.definition: A type of footwear designed for walking on snow.
meanings.sent1: I put on my snowshoe before heading out into the snowy forest.
meanings.sent2: The hiker wore snowshoes to prevent sinking into the deep snow.
meanings.sent3: The snowshoe looked like a big, flat tennis racket strapped to my foot.
meanings.sent4: Her snowshoe left a trail of imprints in the fresh snow, like a giant footprint.
meanings.sent5: The snowshoe made a satisfying crunching sound with each step.

meanings.sent1: I snowshoe across the frozen lake to reach the other side.
meanings.sent2: We decided to snowshoe through the winter wonderland for some exercise.
meanings.sent3: He tried to snowshoe up the steep hill but kept slipping back down.
meanings.sent4: She snowshoed through the snow-covered meadow like a graceful dancer.
meanings.sent5: The group planned to snowshoe to the mountain peak for a breathtaking view.
